author: Simon Difford
description: Surprising dry with sharp zesty citrus, laced with 4 different white spirits and triple sec liqueur, lengthened with lemonade.
name: Long Island Lemonade
recipeIngredient: 15 ml White (charcoal-filtered) 1-4 year old light rum
7.5 ml Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0Â°brix)

recipeInstructions.text: SHAKE first seven ingredients with ice and strain into ice-filled glass
